description: Removes a Windows Defender Firewall rule created to block a specific IPv4 address. Validates IPv4 format, checks for the existence of the rule before attempting deletion, and reports status as unblocked, not found, or error. Outputs a single NDJSON record and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback. Requires administrative privileges.

script_parameters.name: Direction
script_parameters.description: Firewall rule direction: Inbound or Outbound. Default should match the original block rule.

script_parameters.name: MaxWaitSeconds
script_parameters.description: Optional maximum wait/timeout budget for operations.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
